title: Introduction
description: Welcome to the BetterCraft documentation site.
content:
# What is BetterCraft

Welcome to BetterCraft documentation site!

This project is built using **%100 Blueprints**.

# Before open the project:

* Enable these plugins
  * [**Fast Noise Generator**](https://www.fab.com/listings/c1d444fc-54cc-4f11-8a4a-c0c41112a321)
  * [**Blueprint FileSDK**](https://www.fab.com/listings/9020eef3-f598-473d-9964-84ad507002be)
